title: Integrate gates into complete-task.md
description: Enhance the existing complete-task.md command to call validation gates: run pre-execution gate after loading task, create checkpoint before changes, run post-execution gate before marking finished. Add gate result summaries to output.
notes: Enhanced complete-task.md with ATEF features: added pre-execution gate after task load, checkpoint creation before file changes, post-execution gate before marking finished, pattern suggestions in confirmation, and comprehensive gate result summaries in feedback.
